queryMap.query: SELECT TGC.GRP_CD -- 그룹코드 , TGC.GRP_NM -- 그룹명 , TSC.CD -- 코드 , TSC.CD_NM -- 코드명 , TSC.RMK -- 비고 FROM TBDA_GRP_CD TGC , TBDA_SPEC_CD TSC WHERE TGC.GRP_CD = TSC.GRP_CD AND TSC.DEL_YN = 'N' AND TGC.GRP_CD IN ('D10083','D10094') ORDER BY TSC.CD

SELECT '0' CHK, TVSC.SEQ, TVSC.VIOL_CD, TVSC.VIOL_NM, TVSC.VIOL_SCR, TVSC.INST_ID, TVSC.INST_DTM, TVSC.UPDT_ID, TVSC.UPDT_DTM FROM TBDB_VIOL_SCR_CD TVSC WHERE (TVSC.VIOL_CD = ? OR ? IS NULL) ORDER BY TVSC.SEQ
INSERT INTO TBDB_VIOL_SCR_CD ( SEQ, VIOL_CD, VIOL_NM, VIOL_SCR, INST_ID, INST_DTM ) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, SYSDATE )
UPDATE TBDB_VIOL_SCR_CD SET SEQ = ?, VIOL_NM = ?, VIOL_SCR = ?, UPDT_ID = ?, UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE VIOL_CD = ?
